pageTitle: Measurment for Tuxedo Vest TEAL Vest and CRAVAT Polyester Satin
textBeforeTable: Vest Measure for Tuxedo Measurement Videos You can try to fit yourself by following the directions below and use the sizing chart as a guide. If you don't have a measuring tape you can click on the link below to print yourself a measuring tape. Or you can also scroll down to the bottom of this page and find a printable form you can bring to your local Tuxedo shop for a courtesy fitting. Click here to print out a measuring tape (185 KB PDF). Measurements & Sizing
